kdl.prox.dbvis
Class DBVisGraphMgr

java.lang.Object
  kdl.prox.dbvis.DBVisGraphMgr

public class DBVisGraphMgr
extends java.lang.Object

Class that uses JUNG (http://jung.sourceforge.net/) to support incremental exploratory visualization of a Proximity database. Operations are reflected in a Graph instance. Graph changes are reflected in GraphEdit instances. Also maitains a History of Vertex instances that were expanded. NB: When expansion limits are reached adds special 'pager' vertices and edges to represent remaining un-shown graph elements.

See ProxSparseVertex regarding special pseudo and pager vertices and edges.

See Also:
ProxSparseVertex

addVertex

public ProxSparseVertex addVertex(ProxSparseVertex vertex)

addVertexForObjID

public ProxSparseVertex addVertexForObjID(java.lang.Integer objOID)
Adds a new Vertex to my graph that represents objOID. One-arg overload that verifies Vertex's OID exists in object table.

A note on label attributes: addVertexForObjID() does *not* retrieve label (or any other) attributes - it simply initializes the graph, not touching the DB at all. You must call expandVertex() for attributes to be retrieved.

Parameters:
objOID -
Returns:
See Also:
expandVertex(kdl.prox.dbvis.ProxSparseVertex, int)

clear

public void clear()
Clears my graph and history by removing all vertices, edges, and history items.

expandVertex

public GraphEdit expandVertex(ProxSparseVertex vertex,
                              int maxDegreePerVert)
Expands vertex in one of two ways, depending on whether it is a pager or not. If not, it adds Vertex instances to my graph for every object connected to vertex, i.e., adds its 1D neighborhood, including Edge instances for each link. Honors vertex and edge paging limits, based on maxDegreePerVert arg. In the pager case, expands the "real" Vertex on the other end of vertex, adding the number of vertices stored in vertex's pageSize(), and ignoring maxDegreePerVert.

Note: This method disconnects vertex if it's a pager, which breaks subsequent getPagedVertexFromPager() calls. Work-around: Call that method *before* calling this one.

todo maxNumEdgesPerVertPair

Parameters:
vertex - A Vertex from my graph
maxDegreePerVert - ignored if vertex is a pager
Returns:
a GraphEdit instance that details Vertex and Edge instances added

Returns:
my Graph. NB: Does not return a copy.

getHistory

public java.util.List getHistory()
Returns:
my history, a List of Vertex instances with the first one (0th) being the the oldest and the last being the newest. NB: Does not return a copy.

setItemLabelAttribute

public void setItemLabelAttribute(java.lang.String attrName,
                                  boolean isObject)
Sets the object or link attribute used for labels to attrName, based on isObject. Results in user data being set for future expansions.

Parameters:
attrName - name of attribute to use for labels. pass null to clear
isObject -
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if attrName is not defined, or is multi-columned
